name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Lots of people are asking for a live feed. I live a long way away from him, and we are both still being super careful re. covid, so I can't set one up for him. If anyone can recommend a UK based solution that works out of the box, let me know. Can't promise anything though.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I haven't been able to see him for over a year now, due to Covid, and I miss him terribly. Sharing this with you all, and how lovely you've all been about him, has taken the sting out of that a bit, so thank you.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Also: someone said that my dad is everyone's dad now (sorry I can't quote you lovely person, your tweet flew past so fast and I can't find it again!). This delights me. He is a brilliant dad. I wish everyone had dads as gentle, kind, competent and loving as mine.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Lots of people have asked if I'll write a children's book based on this. I am not skilled at writing for anyone that young, however I do plan to include it in a book I'm working on at the moment! How could I not? ;)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Honestly, the absolute bestest thing is all the people saying it's brightened their day. YAY! I am so glad! I wish I could make you all a cup of tea (or other comforting beverage of your choice) and give you a hug. #operationmallard updates will have to suffice though!

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: My stream is moving so fast and I am so overwhelmed I can't reply to everyone otherwise my brain will get too fried and I won't be able to do the thing I want to work on today. But please do keep sending your stories about ducks and other birds nesting at your homes!

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: He said his friends have been nagging him to get a proper camera and a tripod and he said "Oh I can't be doing with all that, I wouldn't know where to start. And anyway, it's the ducklings that are the priority." Too right. He takes his Duck Dad responsibilities very seriously <3

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Oh, and I said you were all VERY INVESTED NOW and he's apologised in advance for not being able to film the moments they hatch but he'll be too busy running around trying to catch tiny beeping ducklings and putting them in a bucket with a grumpy Momma duck complaining.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: She went for him last year, understandably, when he went out onto the balcony to rescue the ducklings. But it makes me laugh to imagine m'Dad and this duck having these silent conversations, these moments of connection. He is so adorable.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: "When she comes back, she stands on the rail and looks at me. It's like she's trying to place me. I look back at her, and think 'Do you remember me from last year? Do you remember that I helped you? But you'll not think I'm brilliant next week, will ya?'"

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Mrs Mallard is happy and well, and as the nights have warmed up a little bit, she's hopping off the nest for food and water for a couple of hours after dark, when it's safer. But today, she popped down to the water in the morning and Dad said this (it made me laugh):

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Lovelies! An #operationmallard update already! Just spoke to my Dad and he tells me that he expects the ducklings to hatch on May 5th (next Wednesday) but could be the days either side of it. He's finished fully prepping the balcony so the ducklings will be safe.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And yes, I will provide regular updates. As my readers know, I am a monster who loves to make people cry. But only with my fiction, my lovelies, and this is the real world. This is actually serious shit. The fate of 11 ducklings rests in my Dad's hands. Soon, literally.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: As ducklings tend to hatch first thing in the morning, he's also shifting his sleep cycle so he can be certain he'll be awake and ready to help them get to the ground when the big day comes. And, my lovelies, the big day this year will be in early May.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Imagine a man in his sixties COMMANDO CRAWLING ACROSS HIS OWN LIVING ROOM to get to the phone without frightening a nesting duck. That's... that's probably all you need to know about my Dad, really. He is that good.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I phoned a week or so ago and he didn't answer, which was strange. He phoned me back right away. "Sorry, didn't get to the phone quick enough. Forgot to move it last night, so had to commando crawl across the living room so I wouldn't frighten Mrs Mallard."

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: As my Dad put it (imagine a soft Lancashire accent) "They fly past, about six of 'em, calling away to her. Then she covers the eggs with down and leaves and goes of with them for an hour or so. For a coffee and a bit of a natter, I s'pose, then she comes back."

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I enjoy regular updates on Operation Mallard as he calls it (I call it Operation Mallard 2, Electric Boogaloo, because I am silly). Apparently, Mrs Mallard has friends (maybe her children?) who call for her everyday.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: She laid a month earlier this year. And there are 11 eggs! She sits for about 20 hours a day. My Dad has stuck loads of old maps over one half of his patio doors so he can walk around his flat without frightening her. It's adorable.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So this year, the duck came back. Mrs Mallard, as Dad calls her. She scoped the balcony out, destroyed a few plants, picked the planter she wanted to nest in and settled down. My Dad - and I in fairness - were absolutely delighted she came back.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: There were predatory birds circling, so he made sure none of them picked off any ducklings as they made their way to the canal. It was pretty much the best thing that happened last year. My Dad is so great.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Anyway, the day came, and the ducklings hatched, all 7 of them, and he lowered them down to the ground in a bucket while Momma Duck watched carefully and provided a loud commentary throughout. Then he raced down to ground level and made sure they reached the water.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: wouldn't tumble to their deaths moments after hatching. I mean, they bounce pretty well, but not THAT well. And he already had a bucket and also a rope long enough to reach the ground because, like me, my Dad thinks ahead re. fires etc.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And he made a plan for when the time for the ducklings to hatch came. My Dad used to be in the military (survival specialist) so he applied his many skills to making sure all would be well on the big day. He sealed off the gaps in the balcony so the ducklings...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So last year, it was a bit of a saga. He was amazed she chose to nest on his balcony, delighted in fact, and watched over her and the nest during the first lockdown. Honestly, it was a gift for him too. He rearranged the planters on the balcony for safety...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So when this duck picked his balcony, out of dozens of potential nesting spots, she did well. Apart from the whole DEADLY DROP OF DOOM to the water bit. She found the best human to help her. And my Dad takes this responsibility VERY seriously.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Second: My Dad absolutely LOVES wildlife and birds especially. He's been a member of the RSPB (Royal Society for the Protection of Birds for my non-UK lovelies) all his life, since he was a child (he's in his sixties now).

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: First: my Dad's apartment is on the 9th floor. It's about 150 feet up, if memory serves. Ducks usually nest close to water. And in fairness, the water is close.... just a really, really long way down.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: My Dad lives in an apartment near a canal and a certain duck has taken a liking to his balcony. So much so that she nested there last year and is nesting there again this year. But there are some things you need to know about this situation.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Bloody hell, everything is just awful and I am so angry about so many things... so I'm going to tell you about something good happening, something tiny and sweet and inconsequential in the hope it might help you if you are feeling as overwhelmed by horror as I am.

name: Emma Newman

tweet: @ScottKAndrews @NortherlyRose Yeah, I am very early into the whole unmasking thing and there is so much to work through. So much internalised... shame? I guess because the things I wanted to do naturally do were always frowned upon :(

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @scsmith4 I'm so glad you got some help in the end. It's such a difficult journey. And yes, that feeling of everything finally making sense is priceless x

tweet: @NortherlyRose @ScottKAndrews Hi! It's.... quite a journey, isn't it?

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @thatcatpurcell Ahhh, that's an excellent thing, well done you! And yes, you will get there x

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Oh - someone just asked if it's okay to RT the video at the top of this thread. Yes, please do. I want to help people, and while I am tempted to just keep hiding, the video can't help if no-one knows about it! Phew. Right. Tea.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @DaveJProbert Yes - thank you for asking! I am fighting the urge to just not talk about it, but I have made it to help people, and it can't do that if no-one knows it is there. I do appreciate your thoughtfulness x

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But this has used up all of my bravery for now, so... cup of tea, spot of lunch and then I'll be writing this month's newsletter with the latest free short story, one about love and found family because BLIMEY I needed to write something uplifting! (https://t.co/hutuJ0e3TQ )

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Coming to terms with this diagnosis is a long and complicated and quite lonely journey. I don't want anyone to feel alone when dealing with neurodiversity challenges, trauma and mental illness. So I'm hoping that being more open about it will help someone.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This was so very hard to do (I am ridiculously camera shy), but I felt it was important and I explain why in the video. If you know anyone who is considering getting an assessment later in life, it might help them. I'm also thinking of doing more in the future.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Hello my lovelies. [Musters ALL the courage] I have made a video about my experience of getting an autism assessment (twice) leading to a diagnosis at age 44. I hope it might help others in a similar situation. https://t.co/dqwMdyg7g7

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This is the most joyful video and it helped today, so I thought you might like it too. Thank you for all the supportive messages and love you all sent in reply to the thread about my year, they are deeply appreciated. https://t.co/vF674O9TeP

name: Emma Newman

tweet: @GurdeepPandher @Sharrow_irl I really needed this today. Thank you so much x

Take care, my lovelies.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So many of us are struggling, with so many horrendous things at once. I guess I wanted to talk about this past year to fight that lingering stigma about mental illness, and to say that there is no shame in getting help, if you are able. These are awful times, but hold fast.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: If you've reached the end of this thread, blimey! Thanks for sticking with it! Lots of love to you. At some point in the future I will talk more about adult diagnosis of autism, but not now. I need to be stronger and for it all to feel less raw.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: When I am stronger and have healed more, maybe I will be able to handle hanging out on Twitter more, but until then, I may do the odd newsletter shout out and RTing cool stuff (I really want to support my friends better!), but not chatting much.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And if you love my work and want to help support me in creating more - and want to have more social connection on posts - my Patreon page is here: https://t.co/7Hc1XY8cG6

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So if you want to keep in touch, you can sign up for my newsletter. It's free. I will send you news about projects, occasional silliness and a story every month. You can sign up here: https://t.co/hutuJ0e3TQ

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Newsletter subscribers receive the story a week or so later, for free. My Patreon doesn't have tiers, and patrons get access to all the previous stories I've written in the Planetfall universe. This week I'll be releasing the tenth story. Which is nice.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I am aiming (and currently succeeding!) to write one short story a month. Patrons get to read it first, then newsletter subscribers. Recently I've managed to post and chat with patrons in my Patreon space too. I'm gonna tell you where you can find them in case you're interested.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I am focusing my reduced social resources on my newsletter and my Patreon, because I still want to be able to connect with people. I cannot handle Zoom etc very well, so probably won't be participating in online events for the foreseeable.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It is overwhelming. Overloading. Opening Twitter is like opening an emotional blast furnace and standing there wondering how long I can look in before it does too much damage. It's changed here over the years, and my ability to cope with that has diminished.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Which brings me to Twitter, and by extension, the social side of life online. I have had to pull right back to recover, but even as that happens, I don't think I will be coming back here often. Not for the foreseeable future anyway.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So, I am autistic. I have cPTSD. I am having to re-evaluate everything about my life and how I function day to day. Self-care is now critical, and not something I can ignore anymore. Well, I could, but then I'll lose another year to hell times.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It is still scary and recovery feels delicate and uncertain. I'm also unpacking a lifetime of struggle and the grief of not getting the help I needed until now. But I am still so very lucky to have found the help I have. So very lucky.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I seriously considered ending my career. Now the ability to write has come back, but it's hard and I'm frustrated by how I am having to pace myself differently. I'm learning that I can't live the way I used to, for so many reasons.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Not that I could actually communicate with friends and family very well during that time anyway. But it was still very hard to get through it with everything else going on. Like trying to survive a severe mental health crisis on hard mode.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: All of this was going on against the backdrop of single parenting during a pandemic. Bereavements, due to covid and due to cancer. Being cut off from my wider support network due to lockdown. All the stuff everyone is struggling with at the moment. (hugs to you all)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It's only been about 4 months since the autism diagnosis. I am still recovering. I couldn't write for months and months, but recently I've been able to write short stories again. Such a relief! I honestly thought I had lost that forever.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I am still processing this. It's a lot to understand and reframe and figure out. It's become clear that the breakdown was just as much, if not more, autistic burnout. And creative burnout too. I had absolutely nothing left in the tank. It was so scary.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: At the age of 44 I was diagnosed as autistic. At the age of 20 I'd been diagnosed with General Anxiety Disorder, but it was a misdiagnosis. I'd been struggling to manage all my life, and suddenly understood why. And why aspects of the anxiety never seemed to ease up.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I don't want to go into details but I was diagnosed with cPTSD. And then, after months of my therapist saying 'I really think you should seek an autism assessment', I did so. (There is a WHOLE STORY there OMG, but it's not the time to tell it.)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This coincided with the start of lockdown in the UK, and events I'd committed to were being cancelled and to be honest I was actually relieved I didn't have to face doing them. Then the proper work began; dealing with a huge amount of trauma.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Thanks to a recommendation from a friend, I got a therapist, as I was finding it harder and harder to function. After the first session he said I just needed to stop. Stop all commitments, stop working, stop everything. Then do the work to heal.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I'm not gonna lie; I was in a seriously bad place mental health wise. Really, really depressed, exhausted, multiple severe panic attacks a week - sometimes in one day. It was hell. I just wanted it all to end.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So, to cut a very long and unpleasant story short, I had a breakdown early last year. I was skating on the edge of it for over a year before that, truth be told, but in March 2020 I finally sought help.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This is going to be hard to talk about, but I feel it's important because I made a conscious decision to be open about mental health and suffering from anxiety. And I want to explain my absence to those who only connect with me here.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Before I start, please understand that I will probably not reply to most responses. I simply can't, and hopefully by the end of this thread the reason will be clear. Please don't think I am being rude or ignoring you.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Lovelies, I haven't been on Twitter much over the last year or so, certainly not in the way I used to be. I feel the need to talk about why, so I'm just gonna splurge it all out here to get through it. It's gonna be a long thread. [Takes a very deep breath.]

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Anyway, if you're not signed up to the newsletter, you can do that here: https://t.co/hutuJ0e3TQ and then you'll get a link to the latest story. x

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I also provide a link to the latest story in my newsletter (free to subscribe) but I am exhausted, so that will be in a couple of days. Patrons get access to all of those stories immediately, and there are no tiers set. Am trying to make them accessible and also survive!

description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
Just spoke to my Nana to wish her happy birthday, and asked her how she's doing. "Oh, I'm fine, luv. Painted me shed today."

She is 84 years old, a proper Northern matriarch,  a smidge over five feet tall and a force of nature. I love her so much.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
Me: These are scary times. Better work out how to deal with all the extra anxiety.
My brain: Eat biscuits.
Me: That won't help.
My brain: It will. Eat them. Yes. Feel better?
Me: No.
My brain: Eat more.
Me: But-
My brain: EAt AlL tHe BiScUiTs. A L L. O F. T H E M.

Rinse. Repeat.

description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Well, it means the world to me. So excuse me while I go make myself a cup of tea, find a biscuit and go and have a cry. It's something I do a lot at the moment, but this time, the crying will be fuelled by gratitude.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And obviously I wanted to write about kick-ass tech and the horrors of unfettered capitalism and SPACESHIPS, because spaceships are cool. But the impact all these have on people is the thing that I am endlessly fascinated by. And now, in turn, seeing the impact of the books...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: What I have really yearned for, what so many of us do, is forging a connection with someone we have never met, through what we write. With the Planetfall books, I have wanted to write sensitively about mental illness, so we don't feel so alone. To help others understand.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Years and years ago, when I was struggling to get my first publishing deal and being rejected eleventy billion times, I remember saying 'All I want is to just take one person away from the world and give them an escape', and of course, that has evolved over the years.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So the Hugo voting deadline approaches fast, and I thought, 'Damn, better tweet about the Planetfall series being eligible but I don't wanna'. But then this video popped up in my stream and honestly, what Justine says about my books made me cry, especially Planetfall. https://t.co/Y3rGrXq6Mu

tweet: @IShouldReadThat I just watched this and you made me cry! In a good way, I hasten to add! What you said about Planetfall making that difference to your life means the world to me. Thank you so much.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I say it again, my lovelies. If you are a woman and you create things, send me a tweet about them so I can RT it and amplify your work. It is hard. It is scary. Do. It. Anyway. Just like Space Mom would want you to, honey.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Well, my shitty brain, it is the year of our lord 2020 and I'll be damned if I'm going to stay scared and quiet about my work any more. And what's more, I'm gonna say that the Planetfall series is eligible for the Hugo Best Series Award, just to prove that.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And even now, even after explaining why this is hard, all the while I am writing these tweets about my work, my brain is *screaming* at me to stop. Stop blowing my own trumpet. Sit down. Be quiet. Be demure.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: All sci-fi, they span other sub-genres too; murder mystery, psychological thriller, horror. And they are political AF (as sci-fi always has been). One (Before Mars) explores post-natal depression as well as the ramifications of unfettered capitalism on the colonisation of Mars.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And you know what? I am DAMN PROUD of those four books. They focus on complex, deeply flawed characters trying to live in the near future hell we are currently heading towards at breakneck speed. They have awesome future tech! And each one is different.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So, that thing I am proud of? Atlas Alone, the fourth (standalone) novel set in the Planetfall universe, has now been shortlisted for two Best Novel Awards, the most recent one being the Prometheus Award. (The other is the BSFA Best Novel Award.)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But anyway. What I'm saying is, this shit is hard. And if you're one of the women who looked at yesterday's thread and is still unable to tweet about your work for me to RT, I understand. [hands you a cup of tea, sits you down, offers a biscuit].

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I guess what I am saying is, there are a hell of a lot of negative modifiers every time we roll the dice. And judging by the Ironsworn campaign I'm playing in atm, my dice rolling skills are poor. ;)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And I am a single parent now. I am *tired*. I am spinning so many plates, like so many other women I know, whether in a partnership or not. The dystopian hellscape we live in now gives zero fucks about people needing to rest. Needing to recover.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And all of this with the strong headwind of living in the fucking patriarchy. Being blasted with the constant sulphurous stench of misogyny, in news headlines, in social media pile-ons, in the things we see play out around us time and time again.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This reluctance to talk about my own work is so deeply tied in with so many things that are hard to disentangle. British reticence is one, I think. Being socialised as a woman is another. Having life experiences that have eroded my confidence is another.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I have spent the last 24 hours or so amplifying other creatives who happen to be women (and want to continue to do that!), only to neglect telling you about something I'm proud of about my own work. So I just had a cup of tea and gave myself a stern talking to.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @LM_Towton @MSuttonArt Well done x

name: Emma Newman

tweet: @Notagoth This shit is hard.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
ALSO: If you have read this thread and thought "Well, I'm a woman but the thing I create isn't possibly good enough to tweet about" STOP RIGHT THERE.

I understand. I really, really do. But you need to secure that shit, Hudson, and tell me about it anyway. Your stuff matters.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @DuskovaMidnight Well done :) Brains can be so annoying

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: If you are a woman creating stuff, be it art, books, websites, clothes, code, research, whatever, tell me something you are really proud of, with a link, preferably. I will RT it and then you will be amplified and my brain won't seize up.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I over think it terribly, you see. I get nervous about leaving people out, about hurting people's feelings, all that sort of thing. But I want to amplify women and their work, and yet I have so little brain space atm. So I have a solution...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
So there is a thing going round twitter encouraging people to amplify women by listing ten of them, and then some of them go on to list ten more etc.

I am grateful to be included in these, but I find this sort of thing hard to participate in, because of my brain.

name: Emma Newman

tweet: @agentFin I want there to be at least one more, not sure when that will happen though.

description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: In an effort to combat despair I am focusing on small acts of kindness today. Made a cup of tea for a delivery driver and had a chat and he transformed from tired and sad to cheery. Tea is powerful. So is kindness.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Don't get me wrong, even then I was painfully aware of the many horrific things this country has done, and continues to do, but that ceremony felt hopeful and said 'look at the good things we can achieve when not being relentlessly awful, let's be better than we have been'.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @ghostfinder I have tried not to comment on or rant about politics here for a while. Haven't been here much lately anyway due to life being awful, but there we go.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
Fuck. 

The last time I was actually proud of my country was the 2012 Olympics ceremony. How fucking far we have fallen since then.

Devastated. Absolutely devastated.

(This tweet is breaking a personal social media rule, but fuck. I did not need more heartbreak in 2019.)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
'We're all in strung out shape, but stay frosty, and alert. We can't afford to let one of those bastards in here.'

It's polling day. Please vote. I won't say which way, obviously, but if you've read any of my books you probably have an idea of my political leanings anyway.

tweet: I know I am staggering to the end of the worst year of my life, and there is A LOT more stress between me and the turn of the year, so this stings more than it should. But still. I am sad. The despair did not need more fuel, dammit.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:

Me, looking at the novel I wrote with a protagonist who is EXACTLY who they are lamenting the lack of: https://t.co/FaIE6FFTiw

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I said things have been tough for the past two months. That's a lie. They have been tough for the whole of this awful, awful year, but the last two months have been particularly bad.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It is unscripted, hesitant, unpolished. Deliberately so. And bonus feature: you don't have to see my face. It's just soothing footage of my hands as I do a jigsaw puzzle, and my voice. That's it. Not thrilling, but hopefully helpful to someone.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I haven't been around because things are really, really tough and have been for the past two months. In an effort to try to do something constructive, I made a video of talking about creativity during periods of extreme stress: https://t.co/pNvcCP4vDB

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Lovelies, things are really tough for me atm. I want to experiment with a way of still being able to do something useful while I am diminished, so I have a question: if you could listen to my thoughts on a topic related to writing (or maybe something else) what would it be?

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And I'm gonna carry on doing all I can to help people when I have the spoons, and writing books that I hope give people an oasis in this unfeeling, cruel desert that is modern life. Because what else can I do with the tools and skills and energy I have right now?

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So this is what I am doing. And narrating. And painting. And the SeKriT PrOjEcT ;) And raising my boy to be loving and gentle and thoughtful and a fucking badass who laughs in the face of so many outdated ideas and works damn hard to make things better.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @SarahPinsker Indeed. But people like you, and the books you write, give me hope x

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Now? Now that we are several years into this hell, I find myself just as furious, but more inclined to try and offer solace. To try and offer hope, even if they are tiny glimpses of it in the moments of connection between people.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I wanted to shake people and say 'LOOK! Look what we are sleepwalking into!' Sadly, a lot of what happens in the future history of my books is coming to pass... only about ten years sooner than I predicted in my fictional timeline, and for different reasons.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: ... and that was as a result of what I thought could be the effects of the TTIP if it went through. What halcyon days were those! Before Tr**p, before fucking Brexit, before what seems to be the collapse of any rational politic discourse.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But the stories have been hopeful, despite this being one of the worst years of my life so far. And I didn't just want to soothe myself, I realise, I wanted to soothe my readers too. Back when I wrote After Atlas, I was so angry with what I could see coming...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: This will be the fifth one, and they are some of the most uplifting, hopeful and... warm stories I've ever written. I think that, without realising it, I was soothing myself with them. They are all set in the Planetfall universe, which is not a nice place at all...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Yesterday I was editing the short story that will go out to my newsletter subscribers and patrons tomorrow. Somehow, in the week from hell, I managed to write one. And it made me reflect on the short stories I've been writing for that audience.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But as anyone who has met me IRL knows, I really don't like to talk about projects in progress. All will be revealed when the time comes. But anyway, back to this feeling of impotence in the face of all the horror and what we do as creatives.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It's also made some ideas crystallise in my mind for a project I've been working on quietly in the background for a few weeks now, one that I will be starting as soon as I am re-settled. It is something that I hope will help to fill the gap left by Tea and Jeopardy.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I am picking up this thread after a couple of days of reflection (and really awful house move stress OMG) and firstly I wanted to say thank you to everyone who replied. It seems a lot of us are feeling the same, and a lot of us need art as solace.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I just... go quiet. I step back, because it feels crass to say such things when people are fighting to be heard, to be listened to, in the face of the resurgence of the far right and the poison of unfettered capitalism.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Like a John Travolta gif version of myself as a creative, looking lost and stupid and detached from the reality of the world we are in right now. But my books are about the world we live in right now, especially the SF books, as SF is always about now!

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: For a long time now I've felt really reluctant to talk about my work on here. I write books, I narrate books, I paint. Talking about those things feels like walking out into a riot, a fucking furious riot, and saying 'hey, I made a thing, look!' while people struggle and fight.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @Entorien Yes. [hugs you back]

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I cannot resolve that conflict in my mind. I don't know who to be here or what to talk about. I just feel like walking outside of my house and just screaming at the sky. Anything else feels just as ridiculous and ineffectual and just as likely to help.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So many of us have been so scared and so angry for so long now. How do we live with this? How do we function? It feels wrong to talk about books and art on here, while at the same time it feels like we need books and art more than ever.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet:
Trying to manage what feels like cascading personal life failure at the same time as living through what feels like cascading democratic and environmental failure sure is super great for my anxiety disorder.

By super great I mean fucking catastrophic.

So it has been an age since I have been on here, and that's because a lot of very tough things have been happening IRL, and Twitter just exhausted me more. 

Sorry I haven't been around as people have tweeted lovely things at me.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @TimClarePoet Fear of finishing is a bugger. [Offers a gentle hug and a cup of tea] May I suggest thanking the fear for trying to protect you from the possibility the finished book will not be as good as your heart is striving for, then reminding it that editing will fix it?

Pre-ordering
Giving them a nice cup of tea

tweet: @JessWardman I deliberately created a character who had very good reasons to be terrified of everything and everyone and horribly awkward, to cover my own anxiety. As I got more comfortable and got to know people, she became more confident too. We evolved together :)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @JessWardman I think it is an awesome ice breaker for awkward people like me. I find social situations so very difficult, but when I am RPing it isn't me, it's my character, so it makes it easier for me to interact with people, and then after time out there is mutual froth :)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Oh wow. Okay, my mentions are exploding a bit, so imma gonna go shoot some giant insects with the love of my life and come back when I feel a bit more steady xxx

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: @BeccaMeriel Honestly? The fact you are coming is absolutely the best thing! The fear I will be there with one person (who thinks it’s a different event) and a tumbleweed has been keeping me up at night! So thank you and I look forward to seeing you!

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So there you go. Hi. I’m Emma. I have an anxiety disorder and a new book coming out today called Before Mars and that combination has destroyed me for the past week or so. And if any of this has resonated: [GIANT HUG OFFERED]

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Or, I dunno, shooting giant insects with my husband (Playing EDF 4.1 Shadow New Despair with him at the moment and it is an awesome escape too). Getting through the day one minute at a time. Like we have to sometimes.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But I felt I had to talk about this because I made that commitment to talk about living with this. I wasn’t able to talk about it before now. Thanks to last night, I can. Tomorrow? I may just be hiding in my office again, talking about LARP with friends.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So I am exhausted. Anxious. Happy that I have another book out, terrified of how it will be received. Guilty for not being happy and grateful without baggage. And, like, ten other emotions all at once!

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Today I am actually able to have a proper conversation with my husband. We agreed that it’s like I have been away for over a week, when my body has been in the house the whole time. The poor man has had it tough with me being that way.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I have the launch in London on Thursday night and I am trying SO DAMN HARD to hold onto this little bit of clarity I have gained today. I look back on the last week or so and think “blimey. I really have been insane.” I am not saying that lightly.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: .. I am still very anxious about the book coming out. About reviews. About sales. About whether I still have a career. And that’s on top of all the other things we have to worry about in today’s political climate. Urgh. Tiring.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: That’s the thing about mental illness. You cannot rationalise that shit away when you are in a massive flare up and the beast has you in its jaws. And whilst the worst of it passed thanks to that epiphany and the event being super great...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And what is so fucking hilarious (so not) is that I KNEW I WAS HAVING AN ANXIETY FLARE UP and that I was not thinking rationally and totally withdrawing into myself and hiding away and blah blah blah and STILL COULD NOT STOP IT.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: … it’s an insidious, clever little bastard that hides really well from conscious thought. That fear of showing a sliver of myself that hurts so much was hiding behind all sorts of terrible, catastrophic thinking and physical symptoms.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Right, I have a cup of tea now. Where was I? So yeah, the whole ‘people seeing me’ thing is a known stressor. I talk about it in my anxiety and writing workshop that I do at conventions, actually. But, the thing about anxiety is...

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I have been so afraid that this book is terrible, when in fact, I was actually super afraid that people will see me. Hang on. BRB, need a cup of tea and a tissue because I am having a bit of a cry.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But last night, when I was reading the first part of the first chapter, I realised he was right. In this book, I am baring a sliver of myself that I am still so deeply, deeply upset by. There is shame. There is terrible grief. And I was scared of that.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And my husband was like, love, this is because of this dark shit you are tapping into. And I was like, nah. It’s just [insert whatever spurious reason that popped into my head at the time].

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: With Before Mars, I drew upon one of the worst times of my life: suffering from post-natal depression. And no word of a lie, it was the hardest book to write by a long, long way. I fought myself throughout. I felt miserable at so many points.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: It’s because of the part of myself that I put into this book. With Planetfall, I drew on my anxiety disorder, and boy, that was tough. With After Atlas, I tapped into my rage at capitalism and corporate fuckery.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I thought the anxiety was all about whether Before Mars will do well enough for me to get a chance to write more Planetfall books. And while that is a totally legit concern, it is not the root of this anxiety hell I’ve been in.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: When it came to my turn to read, there was a full blown adrenalin catastrophe happening in my body. My voice was not at its best. A little strained. Too breathy. As a narrator it was painfully obvious to me, but I did the best I could. And I had this epiphany

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Not gonna tag the lovely chap here, cos this thread is a big one already. We both did a reading and then a joint Q &A. Obvs don’t need to tell you he was awesome, because our Adrian is amazing and I love him.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: When I can’t write, I know it is really, really bad. But there we go. Some days you get the bear. Some days the bear gets you, as Riker would say. Anyway, back to last night in Bristol. I shared the event with my buddy Adrian Tchaikovsky.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So anyway. I had my first of two launch events last night, in Bristol. I was a mess beforehand. Just wanted to shut myself away in my office and sew. Couldn’t write for the past week, couldn’t hold a complex thought it my head, it was so bad.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: .. I take my RP really fucking seriously and it is my favourite thing ever. I am the girl who tabletopped the night she was coming down with meningitis (ended up in hospital the next morning) because I was NOT GOING TO MISS THE GAME DAMN IT.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: And I kept thinking: I should be doing more! I should be working harder on promotion! But I was incapable. The anxiety was so severe, not even a weekend of D&D with dear friends was enough to distract me. And that might sound flippant, but….

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: I had a panic attack one morning when I sat down to answer some email interviews for promoting Before Mars. I had to go and find my husband, have cuddle and cry and then he sat with me and helped me with each question until they were done. (he is awesome)

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: But I just… couldn’t. I hid away. Over the past 7 days or so, I’ve been a total mess. My anxiety spiked severely. Sleepless nights. Or sleep + nightmares. Palpitations. Inability to concentrate. Almost bursting into tears at any moment. The odd panic attack.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: As today approached, I was aware of an increasing pressure building: I should be online more. I should be more social. I have a book coming out soon! No-one will know about it! Work harder! Promote! And of course the subtext here was: You are failing.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So the last couple of weeks I have barely been on Twitter, just popping in occasionally to RT a nice mention or two, or reply to people. This isn’t the way I like to use Twitter. I wasn’t being very social.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Okay, so I need to talk to you about something. Something I committed to being more open about a few years back. Living with anxiety. This is the ‘launching a book whilst having an anxiety disorder’ thread.

tweet: For UK readers of the Planetfall suite of novels, the Gollancz deal means that they should be far easier to obtain in more UK book shops.The UK editions will have the same cover images, but with a different font.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: So if you are a UK reviewer (looking at @Bluebookballoon @EffingRainbow and @D_Libris who asked earlier in the week in particular!) and you’d like to review Before Mars, probably best to get in touch with your contact at Gollancz.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: Then the UK edition of Before Mars will come out in April, just like the US edition. The amazing @RebeccaTheGeek is still my editor and Ace (formerly Roc) will still be publishing my US editions as planned.

name: Emma Newman
description: Writer, audiobook narrator, tea drinker. Dressmaker, gamer and roleplayer. Author of urban fantasy & science fiction novels. Occasional YouTuber. #Autistic
tweet: That’s the paperback editions, I hasten to add! I believe the ebook UK editions are out at the end of this month.

tweet: I am so very glad to have a UK publisher again! So here is what this means for the novels: firstly, there will be new UK editions of Planetfall and After Atlas released early next year (available for pre-order now I believe).
